short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gateway 2 Finance is the easiest way to gain risk insights on the companies you do business with in just one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With our our partners at Nimbla and WiserFunding, you can now instantly obtain a financial & credit/risk report on any UK registered company.

G2F Risk Insights is available via a handy widget on leading accounting applications such as Xero, Quickbooks, Freshbooks & Sage (as well as the Chrome toolbar of course!).

Get up-to-the-minute financial & credit risk reports on any company that you are currently trading with (or about to) to understand their financial position and your risk.

Simply sign-up & purchase a WiserFunding report-pack of either 1, 5, 10 or 25 and Go!

Be aware of who you are trading with and confident in their ability to pay on time!
